content: SPX A Metal cutting disc for battery cut-off saws Ultimate metal cutting disc engineered to maximize your cutting speed and cuts-per-charge with battery-powered cut-off saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Maximize productivity – lift the performance of your DSH 600-22 battery cut-off saws to the next level by using cutting discs developed specially for these tools Unbeatable cutting speed – these abrasive discs cut metal deck 4-5x faster than Hilti’s best diamond blades Higher cutting performance, for longer – premium grain and bond help to make these some of our most durable and powerful metal cutting discs Applications Metalwork – cutting steel profiles, pipes and steel sheets Maximizing overall tool performance when using DSH 600-22 battery-powered cut-off saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Base material: Steel Tool type: Battery cut-off saw Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Base material | Metal | Tool type | Battery cut-off saw ### ITEMS- 2333288 - Cutting disc AC-D 12 GS/ST SPX cordl. - Package Size 10 pc
